data.title: Airtable Story 1
data.author: Airtable Author
data.PostMarkdown:
---
title: Hello World
date: "2015-05-01T22:12:03.284Z"
description: "Hello World"
---

This is my first post on my new fake blog! How exciting!

I'm sure I'll write a lot more interesting things in the future.

Oh, and here's a great quote from this Wikipedia on
[salted duck eggs](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salted_duck_egg).

> A salted duck egg is a Chinese preserved food product made by soaking duck
> eggs in brine, or packing each egg in damp, salted charcoal. In Asian
> supermarkets, these eggs are sometimes sold covered in a thick layer of salted
> charcoal paste. The eggs may also be sold with the salted paste removed,
> wrapped in plastic, and vacuum packed. From the salt curing process, the
> salted duck eggs have a briny aroma, a gelatin-like egg white and a
> firm-textured, round yolk that is bright orange-red in color.

![Chinese Salty Egg](./salty_egg.jpg)

You can also write code blocks here!

```js
const saltyDuckEgg = "chinese preserved food product"
```

data.PostMarkdown:
**Nibh enim hendrerit orci lacus natoque sodales**

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit, mattis dictumst facilisis dis nibh phasellus turpis et, fermentum natoque ultrices conubia bibendum molestie. Aptent condimentum venenatis magna at purus tristique cursus libero, lacinia taciti quisque neque odio ut nostra fusce, suspendisse aliquet hendrerit mi felis per sodales. Auctor aliquet interdum ad sed viverra congue dictumst faucibus, curabitur class vehicula libero diam vivamus ridiculus, mollis et vulputate purus metus lacus eros.

Quis dapibus habitant tempus mauris conubia nullam praesent cubilia egestas vestibulum in erat penatibus, eleifend lobortis turpis duis integer tincidunt est fermentum nec nibh bibendum. Fusce cursus neque vulputate ad aliquam nullam dictum enim odio feugiat lectus, parturient maecenas nunc vel orci tempus magna sociis vivamus morbi, ac et cras quisque auctor integer montes luctus leo lobortis.

**Aptent duis porta ligula egestas**

- Sapien facilisis morbi nec nisi curae, torquent leo fringilla.

- Quam class a etiam cursus id, scelerisque nostra gravida risus.

- Lacinia volutpat turpis gravida praesent posuere, suscipit ante suspendisse varius.

Gravida aliquet elementum natoque nisl varius nisi cursus venenatis nulla neque pulvinar, dis facilisi vehicula habitasse ultricies massa sollicitudin leo pharetra senectus, proin parturient fames blandit arcu lacus sodales egestas purus eros.

Diam sapien elementum in consequat penatibus congue vehicula, at proin quam laoreet tortor vitae convallis, scelerisque porttitor ligula urna phasellus posuere.
